item.title: On the differential $K$-theory of moduli stacks
item.description: arXiv:2501.03108v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We compute the connective differential $K$-theory and the differential cohomology of the moduli stack of principal $G$-bundles with connection. The results are formulated in terms of invariant polynomials and the representation ring of $G$. We use the homotopy theory of presheaves of spaces and presheaves of spectra to establish the results.
item.dc:creator: Daniel Grady
